content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai regional district court the text mentions the costs involved in the case including professional fees and stamp duties the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property awarding specific items to each party the court also discussed various articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property the applicant brought a legal action seeking the dissolution of their marriage and the division of assets the court determined which assets are community property and which are personal property the court found that the applicant is entitled to a larger share of the property and ordered the defendant to pay a certain amount the court also awarded costs to both parties the text also mentions the progress of the legal case including the amendment of the application and counterclaim the marriage will be dissolved due to the fault of one party and the divorce will have legal effects on the property rights of the spouses the text lists various immovable properties and their market values it also mentions the property rights of state land plot lease agreements the text concludes by mentioning the market value and registered name of two passenger cars the document further states that one party is obligated to fulfill a credit obligation contract and that the other party is recognized as personally liable the court orders one party to pay a certain amount for nonpecuniary damage and awards costs of the proceedings to the other party the court also orders the payment of stamp duty to the state the remaining claims and counterclaims are dismissed
